com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.webAPI

Class WebDriverController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.webAPI.WebDriverController
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebController<WebDriverController>

    @Component
@Scope(value="prototype")
public class WebDriverController
extends Object
implements WebController<WebDriverController>
    This class contains the implementation of webDriver API for interaction with UI
    Author:
    Giannis Papadakis(mailTo:gpapadakis84@gmail.com)
